span.style: font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #222222;
span.strong: To the Springs community please join us in contacting our Senator and Congress to receive federal funds in order to keep our state aid at current levels.

span.style: font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #222222;

strong.br: A la comunidad de Springs, únase a mí para contactar a nuestro Senador y al Congreso para recibir fondos federales a fin de mantener nuestra ayuda estatal en los niveles actuales.

p.style: box-sizing: inherit; font-family: FuturaBTWXX-Book, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center;
box-sizing: inherit; font-family: FuturaBTWXX-Book, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;
box-sizing: inherit; font-family: FuturaBTWXX-Book, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

div.p: Join us as we invite you into the studios of our closest artist friends and supporters for a weekly art break. Utilizing simple materials found at home, learners of all ages will explore new ways of bringing creativity into their everyday by virtually visiting and creating with an East End artist.

p.style: box-sizing: inherit; font-family: FuturaBTWXX-Book, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

div.p: New episodes will be posted on our website, Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube channel each Friday afternoon at 1pm. If you post your art to social media, be sure to hashtag it with #GHARTBREAK

div.style: display: none;

h2.style: text-align: center;

p.span: Attached, please find a suggested plan for the days the students will be at home engaging in digital learning. Keep in mind that we are recommending a routine, and not a schedule. We are recommending that student work in chunks. It is easier for children to learn and work in specific time blocks instead of individual subjects. Please keep in mind that children do not need to complete all the work in one sitting. Academic work should be spread out over time. We do not want students to be anxious or overwhelmed. On a final note, sometimes it helps to live with your plan a while before finalizing it. The most effective plans are personalized to the need of the student/child and consistent.

span.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: #f2f2f2;
span.strong: Paddlers for Humanity's Catastrophic Fund is supporting the East End's COVID-19 relief efforts.

br.style: color: #f2f2f2; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7;
color: #f2f2f2; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7;

span.style: text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: #f2f2f2;

br.span: We are giving to individuals and families in need of immediate financial assistance, and are donating to food pantries, non-profits and other entities that are looking out for our community members. Do you know someone in need? Reach out to us at

a.style: text-size-adjust: 100%; color: #007c89; font-weight: normal; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-size: 18px;

br.style: color: #f2f2f2; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7;
color: #f2f2f2; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7;

a.style: text-size-adjust: 100%; color: #007c89; font-weight: normal; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7;

span.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: #f2f2f2;

br.span: to the P4H Catastrophic Fund today and we will put your dollars to work supporting our most vulnerable community members.

span.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: #f2f2f2;

font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: #f2f2f2;

font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: #f2f2f2;

font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: #f2f2f2;

font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center; background-color: #50b2e7; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: #f2f2f2;

p.span:
Estimados padres y personal,
Adjunto, encuentre un plan sugerido para los días en que los estudiantes estarán en casa participando en el aprendizaje digital. Tenga en cuenta que estamos recomendando una rutina, y no un horario. Recomendamos que los estudiantes trabajen en trozos. Es más fácil para los niños aprender y trabajar en bloques de tiempo específicos en lugar de asignaturas individuales. Tenga en cuenta que los niños no necesitan completar todo el trabajo de una sola vez. El trabajo académico debe extenderse a lo largo del tiempo. No queremos que los estudiantes estén ansiosos o abrumados. En una nota final, a veces ayuda vivir con su plan un tiempo antes de finalizarlo. Los planes más efectivos están personalizados a la necesidad del estudiante / niño y consistentes.

h2.style: text-align: center;

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 8.5pt; color: #444444;

strong.span: Good mental health is critical to children's' success in school and life. To better support students and families through distance learning, our mental health team has built a website with many useful resources and links. You will find tools to promote overall Social Emotional well being, information on local community resources, and COVID 19 support.

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: 'Courier New'; color: #222222;
border: 1pt none windowtext; text-decoration: underline; padding: 0in; font-size: 13.5pt; color: #222222;

strong.span: Please click here to access the website.

h2.style: text-align: center;

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 8.5pt; color: #444444;
border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 8.5pt; color: #444444;
border: 1pt none windowtext; text-decoration: underline; padding: 0in; font-size: 16pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif;

strong.span: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE:

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 16pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif;

strong.span: March 30, 2020

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 16pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif;

strong.span: ASSEMBLYMAN THIELE: NEW PROHEALTH DRIVE-THRU COVID-19 TESTING FACILITY OPENS IN RIVERHEAD

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 16pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif;

p.span: Assemblyman Fred W. Thiele, Jr. (I, D, WF - Sag Harbor) today announced that ProHEALTH has opened a drive-thru COVID-19 testing facility in Riverhead, its first in Suffolk County. Drive-thru testing at the Riverhead facility is by appointment only and is open to all, not limited to ProHEALTH Primary Care patients. Individuals experiencing COVID-19 symptoms and wishing to speak to a medical professional, or who wish to make an appointment at the Riverhead drive-thru testing facility, can call the ProHEALTH dedicated hotline at
. The Riverhead drive-thru testing site is located at:
Additional information on drive-thru testing at the Riverhead facility or other ProHEALTH services can be found on the ProHEALTH website, here.

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 13pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif;

em.span: For questions on the coronavirus, please call the New York State Department of Health Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) Hotline at 1-888-364-3065. You can also visit their website for prevention tips and up-to-date information at: https://coronavirus.health.ny.gov/home

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 13pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif;

em.span: Individuals interested in receiving e-mail updates on COVID-19 can sign up here:https://now.ny.gov/page/s/coronavirus-updates

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 13pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif; color: blue;
border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 13pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif; color: blue;
border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 13pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT, serif; color: blue;

em.span: ASAMBLEA THIELE: NUEVA INSTALACIÓN DE PROHEALTH DRIVE-THVU COVID-19 SE ABRE EN RIVERHEAD

El asambleísta Fred W. Thiele, Jr. (I, D, WF - Sag Harbor) anunció hoy que ProHEALTH ha abierto un centro de pruebas COVID-19 en Riverhead, el primero en el condado de Suffolk. Las pruebas de manejo en el centro de Riverhead son solo con cita previa y están abiertas a todos, no se limitan a los pacientes de ProHEALTH Primary Care. Las personas que experimentan síntomas de COVID-19 y desean hablar con un profesional médico, o que desean hacer una cita en el centro de pruebas de manejo de Riverhead, pueden llamar a la línea directa dedicada de ProHEALTH al 1-516-874-0411. El sitio de prueba de manejo de Riverhead está ubicado en:
Lunes a viernes de 8 a.m. a 5 p.m.
Sábado a domingo, de 8 a.m. a 5 p.m.
Puede encontrar información adicional sobre las pruebas de manejo en la instalación de Riverhead u otros servicios de ProHEALTH en el sitio web de ProHEALTH, aquí.

Si tiene preguntas sobre el coronavirus, llame a la línea directa del Nuevo Coronavirus del Departamento de Salud del Estado de Nueva York (COVID-19) al 1-888-364-3065. También puede visitar su sitio web para obtener consejos de prevención e información actualizada en: https://coronavirus.health.ny.gov/home
Las personas interesadas en recibir actualizaciones por correo electrónico sobre COVID-19 pueden registrarse aquí: https://now.ny.gov/page/s/coronavirus-updates

h2.style: text-align: center;

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 21pt; font-weight: normal;

a.title: News_Release_on_Daycare_E_SP.pdf
a.span: Daycare at No Charge for Essential Workers Guardería sin cargo para trabajadores esenciales

March 16, 2020 This message includes weekly updates on the COVID-19 response from CDC. The COVID-19 Outbreak is a rapidly evolving situation and information will be updated on the COVID-19 Situation Summary as it becomes available.

a.title: ENGLISH_ROBOCALL_COMMUNITY_NOTICE.pdf
a.span: Due to the growing numbers of patients with confirmed cases of COVID-19 or Coronavirus, we ask the entire communityto consider the following points with utmost gravity. This situation is classified as a PANDEMIC and is a PUBLICHEALTH EMERGENCY.

a.title: SPANISH_ROBOCALL_COMMUNITY_NOTICE.pdf
a.span: ESTE AVISO ES DE SUMA IMPORTANCIA PARA LA COMUNIDADDebido al creciente número de pacientes con casos confirmados de COVID-19 o Coronavirus, le pedimos a toda laComunidad que considere los siguientes puntos con la mayor SERIEDAD E IMPORTANCIA QUE ESTO MERECE. Estasituación esta clasificada como PANDEMIA y es una EMERGENCIA DE SALUD PÚBLICA.

span.style: border: 1pt none windowtext; padding: 0in; font-size: 8.5pt; color: #ff0000; font-family: Arial; font-size: medium; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: Please see the attached document regarding Mortgage Relief Options.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: Federal and state governments have announced plans to help struggling homeowners during this time. For many homeowners with mortgages, there is help, but first assess your situation.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: If you can pay your mortgage, then pay your mortgage.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: Do not call your mortgage servicer if you are not facing an immediate issue.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: Mortgage servicers are getting a lot of calls and need to first help those who won't be able to pay their mortgage. Check their website first for possible options.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: If you can NOT pay your mortgage, or can only pay a portion, contact your mortgage servicer immediately.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: It may take a while to get a loan servicer on the phone, due to high call volume. Please be sure to read this blog carefully so you are prepared for this conversation.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: A new federal law, the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security (CARES) Act, puts in place 2 protections for homeowners with federally backed mortgages:

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: 2. A right to forbearance for homeowners who are experiencing a financial hardship due to the COVID-19 emergency.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: If you do not have a federally backed mortgage, you still may have relief options through your mortgage servicer or from your state.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: Please see the attached/below document for more information.

div.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
div.span: Please share with any group that may be interested in this important information.

p.style: font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px;
font-family: Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13.3333px; text-align: center;

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; text-align: center;

strong.span: A message from SPRINGS UNION FREE SCHOOL DISTRICT

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

strong.span: Dear Families and Staff,

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

strong.span: EHHS will be distributing their grab and go breakfast and lunch program daily to the parking lot at

Springs Presbyterian Church Pantry on Springs-Fireplace Road. They will be serving from a small school bus. This will take place every morning from 9:30 to 10:30, Monday through Friday. This will be instead of traveling to EHHS.

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

strong.span: Anyone can receive breakfast and lunch for any child that is 18 or below. This is a free service.

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

strong.span: Thank you!

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

strong.span: Eric M. Casale

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;
color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;
color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

span.em: EHHS distribuirá su programa de desayuno y almuerzo para llevar todos los días en el estacionamiento de Springs Presbyterian Church Pantry en Springs-Fireplace Road. Servirán desde un pequeño autobús escolar. Esto tendrá lugar todas las mañanas de 9:30 a 10:30, de lunes a viernes. Esto será en lugar de viajar a EHHS.

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

span.em: Cualquiera puede recibir desayuno y almuerzo para cualquier niño que tenga 18 años o menos. Este es un servicio gratuito.

h2.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;
color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; margin-bottom: 10px; text-align: center;

div.style: display: none;

div.h3: A message from the directors of High School Musical

blockquote.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

h2.style: line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; text-align: center;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

p.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

p.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

strong.span: Well, here it is… the first day of April. When we envisioned this day many months ago, we pictured spending it with all of you, watching each of you shine on stage as you belted out the lyrics to “Stick to the Status Quo,” and danced side by side to “We’re All in This Together.” Unfortunately, circumstances outside of our control and beyond our wildest imaginations have completely turned our plans upside down, and we’re left feeling disappointed, sad, and confused.

p.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

strong.span: At a time like this, it’s been a comfort to look back at

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman'; color: #ffffff;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

strong.span: our memories from play practice this year. When we find ourselves feeling a bit down or blue, we remind ourselves to think of the times we spent together in the commons room and the music room, learning new songs, practicing dances, and having fun together. We want you to know just how proud we are of each and every one of you for your dedication to this year’s production. It has been a privilege and a joy to work with all of you this year.

p.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

strong.span: Many of you are wondering what the future holds for our production. Will we be able to have more rehearsals? Will the show be rescheduled? And to be honest with you, we directors have been asking ourselves those same questions, too. We’ve been reminding one another that we just have to take it one day at a time for now, as hard as that may seem at times, and that we have to remain hopeful for brighter days ahead.

p.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

strong.span: We hope this video brings some joy your way today. We had a lot of fun while making it.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

strong.span: We hope that you’re finding ways to engage with the arts and express your creativity while at home.

p.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

strong.span: So for now, we’ll continue taking things one day at a time. When we have new information, we’ll be sure to check in with all of you. Until then, we hope that you and your families are staying safe and feeling healthy. And remember… we’re all in this together.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';
font-size: 15pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

div.style: display: none;

div.h3: Thiele Press Release-COVID-19 Testing Facility Opens in Riverhead

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; color: black;
text-decoration: underline; font-size: 16pt; font-family: TimesNewRomanPSMT; color: black;

strong.span: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE:
March 30, 2020
ASSEMBLYMAN THIELE: NEW PROHEALTH DRIVE-THRU COVID-19 TESTING FACILITY OPENS IN RIVERHEAD

p.span: Assemblyman Fred W. Thiele, Jr. (I, D, WF - Sag Harbor) today announced that ProHEALTH has opened a drive-thru COVID-19 testing facility in Riverhead, its first in Suffolk County. Drive-thru testing at the Riverhead facility is by appointment only and is open to all, not limited to ProHEALTH Primary Care patients. Individuals experiencing COVID-19 symptoms and wishing to speak to a medical professional, or who wish to make an appointment at the Riverhead drive-thru testing facility, can call the ProHEALTH dedicated hotline at 1-516-874-0411. The Riverhead drive-thru testing site is located at:
Additional information on drive-thru testing at the Riverhead facility or other ProHEALTH services can be found on the ProHEALTH website, here.

em.span: For questions on the coronavirus, please call the New York State Department of Health Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) Hotline at 1-888-364-3065. You can also visit their website for prevention tips and up-to-date information at: https://coronavirus.health.ny.gov/home
Individuals interested in receiving e-mail updates on COVID-19 can sign up here: https://now.ny.gov/page/s/coronavirus-updates

PARA PUBLICACIÓN INMEDIATA:
30 de marzo de 2020
ASAMBLEA THIELE: NUEVA INSTALACIÓN DE PROHEALTH DRIVE-THVU COVID-19 SE ABRE EN RIVERHEAD
El asambleísta Fred W. Thiele, Jr. (I, D, WF - Sag Harbor) anunció hoy que ProHEALTH ha abierto un centro de pruebas COVID-19 en Riverhead, el primero en el condado de Suffolk. Las pruebas de manejo en el centro de Riverhead son solo con cita previa y están abiertas a todos, no se limitan a los pacientes de ProHEALTH Primary Care. Las personas que experimentan síntomas de COVID-19 y desean hablar con un profesional médico, o que desean hacer una cita en el centro de pruebas de manejo de Riverhead, pueden llamar a la línea directa dedicada de ProHEALTH al 1-516-874-0411. El sitio de prueba de manejo de Riverhead está ubicado en:
1149 Old Country Road
Riverhead, NY 11901
Lunes a viernes de 8 a.m. a 5 p.m.
Sábado a domingo, de 8 a.m. a 5 p.m.
Puede encontrar información adicional sobre las pruebas de manejo en la instalación de Riverhead u otros servicios de ProHEALTH en el sitio web de ProHEALTH, aquí.
Si tiene preguntas sobre el coronavirus, llame a la línea directa del Nuevo Coronavirus del Departamento de Salud del Estado de Nueva York (COVID-19) al 1-888-364-3065. También puede visitar su sitio web para obtener consejos de prevención e información actualizada en: https://coronavirus.health.ny.gov/home
Las personas interesadas en recibir actualizaciones por correo electrónico sobre COVID-19 pueden registrarse aquí: https://now.ny.gov/page/s/coronavirus-updates

h2.style: text-align: center;

span.style: font-size: large; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; background-color: transparent; outline: 0px; color: #444444;

strong.span: Good mental health is critical to children's' success in school and life. To better support students and families through distance learning, our mental health team has built a website with many useful resources and links. You will find tools to promote overall Social Emotional well being, information on local community resources, and COVID 19 support.
